column2: for (t in 1:n_t){   # loop through the number of cycles
m_M_notrt[t + 1, ] <- t(m_M_notrt[t, ]) %*% a_P[ , , t]     # estimate the Markov
m_M_trt[t + 1, ]  <- t(m_M_trt[t, ])    %*% a_P2[, , t]      # estimate the Markov
head(m_M_notrt)  # show the first 6 lines of the matrix
head(m_M_trt)  # show the first 6 lines of the matrix
